name: Gift2Help
tag_list: online-donation, donate-online, online-fundraising, uk-fundraising, uk-charities, donate-to-charities, fundraising
description: Online donating to charities made easy.
overview:
Gift2Help.com is a UK-based online donating service that allows people to donate towards the gift or charity of their choice though a convenient online payment system.

Their mission is “To raise awareness for charities and to show donors that every donation, no matter how big or small will make a real difference. We all hold a piece of the jigsaw and together we can create the wider picture and help other people to make this world a better place.”

It supports several charities from all over the world. It accepts donations internationally.

Gift2Help was founded by Markus Striker, who spent time volunteering in Wales and Kenya, and Guenther Aistleitner, who volunteered in Bulgaria and Latvia.
